title: HP PCM+ GetEventsServlet SQL Injection Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on vulnerable installations of HP PCM Plus. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the GetEventsServlet.  This servlet contains a SQL injection vulnerability in the sort and dir arguments.  This can result in remote code execution under the context of the SYSTEM user.
timeline:
2013-02-22 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2013-09-11 - Coordinated public release of advisory
